doc.value:
Work-In-Progress (WIP) profile for [RWMBook](b.mamund.com/rwmbook). Services [SHOULD](http:/b.mamund.com/rfc2119) present a generalized WIP flow for managing the state of a process. For this profile, the following pre-defined link relation values [MAY](b.mamund.com/rfc2119) appear: `cancel`, `create`, `filter`, `home`, `list`, `read`, `share`, `status`, `submit`, `update`.

Typically, services support the creation, update, and ultimately, the final submit of a WIP record. Additional workflow options include getting a (filtered) list of existing WIP records, fetching a single record, updating the status of a single record, sharing an existing WIP record for later retrieval, and the cancelling of an existing WIP record.
The URL of the Work-in-Progress (WIP) step. This [SHOULD](http://b.mamund.com/rfc2119) be one of the well-known WIP labels (see top of this document).

descriptor.title: Relationship value of the WIP link.

doc.value: The link relation value of an available related action. This value [SHOULD](http://b.mamund.com/rfc2119) also include the link relation value of `wip`.

descriptor.title: Text title for the WIP link.

doc.value: Human readable title associated with the link.
Optional media type identifier string. It [SHOULD](http://b.mamund.com/rfc2119) be one defined by [IANA](http://b.mamund.com/iana-formats) or some other authoritative source.
Represents one or more WPI Link elements containing the available related properties
Home represents any current document or starting point in the WIP flow.
Represents the list of available WIP records.
Represents the ability to create a new work-in-progress record.
Represents the ability to read an existing work-in-progress record.
Represents the ability to update an existing work-in-progress record.
Represents the ability to submit an existing work-in-progress record as completed.
Represents the ability to cancel an existing work-in-progress record.

descriptor.title: A filtered list of WIP records.

doc.value: Represents the ability to get a filtered list of available work-in-progress records.
Represents the ability to share or publish an existing work-in-progress record.

descriptor.title: The status of a single WIP resource

doc.value: Represents the ability to update the status of an existing work-in-progress record. Valid status values are `ready`, `working`, `completed`, `cancelled`.
A safe, idempotent action to return to the Home document

descriptor.name: list
descriptor.title: Go to the WIP list resource.

doc.value: An safe idempotent action to return a list of WIP records.
An safe idempotent action to return a single WIP record.
An unsafe idempotent action to create a new WIP.

descriptor.name: filter
descriptor.title: Get a filtered list of WIP records

doc.value: An unsafe idempotent action to create a new WIP.

descriptor.name: update
descriptor.title: Update a single existing WIP resource

doc.value: An unsafe idempotent action to update an existing WIP.
An unsafe idempotent action to cancel an existing WIP.
An unsafe idempotent action to share/publish an existing WIP.

descriptor.name: status
descriptor.title: Modify the status of an exsiting WIP resource

doc.value: An unsafe idempotent action to update the status (ready, working, done, cancelled) of an existing WIP.

descriptor.name: submit
descriptor.title: Submit (for final acceptance) a completed WIP Rresource.

doc.value: An unsafe idempotent action to update an existing WIP.
